tool_description: An API to show all the latest crypto currency news.
name: Crytocurrency Live
title: Crytocurrency Live

api_list.name: Get individual News Source
api_list.description: From crypto news from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crytocurrency-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crytocurrency-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crytocurrency-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crytocurrency-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cryto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Climate Change from selected news sources.
